QuestData.Title: Save Their Bacon
QuestData.Description:
This is going to sound strange, $c, but some of my workers were turned into pigs! Lucky I was out on an errand, or I'd have been caught too! Now my people are tied up awaiting... processing.
<Thomas suppresses the urge to retch.>
I can't get past those monsters, but you look like the sort who could. Not sure if this helps, but I coulda sworn I heard some wild cackling coming from the warehouse.
Please... save my people!
QuestData.LogDescription: Untie Trevor Hightide, Kyle Sailford, Travis Daybreak and Burke Stevenson.
QuestData.CompletionText: Up here they're safe from those monsters. Hopefully we can sort this mess out and return them to normal.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for sending my workers to a safe spot.$b$bHopefully my men won't have to remain pigs for long.
